Package steiner

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DijkstraCache
    A Dijkstra run is frozen and its state is saved in an instance of steiner.DijkstraCache.
    DreyfusWagner
    Implementation of FPT algorithm solving Steiner Tree problem by Dreyfus, Wagner '71
    DreyWagCache
    Simple cache data structure used by the Dreyfus Wagner algorithm
    FastKernel
    Reduction method that completes metric closure incrementally
    Kernel
    Parent class for reduction methods that uses star contractions
    Main
    Program entry point
    Pair<A,B>
    A pair data structure parameterized by two generic types.
    PreProcessor
    Preprocessing algorithm that removes Steiner Vertices of degree at most 2
    ReadInput
    Auxiliary class used to read file in the .gr format and output an instance of the SteinerGraph class
    SlowKernel
    Reduction method that completes metric closure at once
    SortedPair
    A pair of sorted integers
    SteinerGraph
    A Graph data structure that can store properties of a Steiner Tree
    SteinerGraphEdge
    A class representing an edge of a steinerGraph
    SteinerGraphVertex
    A class representing a vertex of a steinerGraph
    SteinerTreeValidator
    Confirms Steiner tree validity by running DFS
